name: Ice Cream Stacker (Louca Coles)
description:
Stack your ice cream as high as possible! Don't miss or its game over!
** Warning - not everything in the game is finished and updates will be made, this testing will help identify any gameplay changes that need to be made **

WHAT'S NEW

* Added auto fire option for sprinkle cannons
* Added auto bubble inflate option for the bubble gum
